department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request to repair replacement of doors and windows on Weatherhaven tents
description: Repair and replacement of doors and windows on Weatherhaven tents in Farnham (Qu\u00e9bec, Canada), as detailed in Annex \\
full_summary:
### Solicitation Title 
W3380-22J004-Repair and replacement services for doors and windows on Weatherhaven tents

### Notice Reference 
WS4017393603-Doc4106633126

### Solicitation Status 
Expired (posted: 2023-08-07, closed: 2023-09-01)

### Background Information 
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defense (DND) published a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of repair and replacement services for doors and windows on Weatherhaven tents at Farnham, Quebec, Canada.

### Scope of Work 
The selected contractor is expected to perform repair and replacement services for doors and windows on Weatherhaven tents, as outlined in the Attachment ‘‘Statement of work’’.

### Evaluation Criteria 
The evaluation of proposals will be based on the Lowest Price.

### Procurement Method 
This procurement is open to all interested bidders.

### Closing Details 
Bids must be submitted electronically no later than 2:00 PM (EDT) on September 1, 2023.

### Additional Information 
Further details can be found on the solicitation page on [Ariba link][ariba]. 

Please note that the attachments linked in this entry (Ariba link, statement of work annexes) were not provided with the original text.
If you were to provide these, they would be presented here.  If not, there will be some holes in this report. 
The expected opening of the solicitation makes any attachments not provided highly likely to also be missing.

Please make sure to see compliance with industry-recognized accessibility standards by justifying your choices where applicable *. [1][ariba]:link adapted for accessibility.
